child.pub-comments: The author points out that the mutual intelligibility between Jamsay's dialects namely Domno, Gono, Bama, Guru is uncertain.

child.geography: Mali: Plateau area north border, separated from Tommo So area south by a mainly uninhabited plain east of Dia, and a deep ravine running westward from Dia to the cliff that ends the plateau. Borko village language area center.
